name: Reality Orb
description:
Dan's worst Ludum Dare game so far! 😅😅😅

ControlsKey-bindingsMovementArrow KeysJumpUp Arrow KeySummon objectsType words Featuring:
  • Omm - the main character
  • Knight - the stupid character
  • Reality Orb - the orb that can let you summon almost anything
  • 50+ objects to be summoned
  • Cool programmer art (honestly I mainly enjoyed making the art for this game)
How does the game fit the theme?

In actuality, the reality orb, when in control, doesn't summon objects. It takes objects from different universes, and if you try to summon them again, you will cause a shift that causes objects to become unstable. Just don't try to summon yourself...

I'm stuck, I don't know what to summon

Try typing in object names like "table", "apple", "pizza", "box", and e.t.c

Credits:
  • Programming - Danial Jumagaliyev (C#/Unity)
  • Art - Danial Jumagaliyev (Aseprite)
  • Music - Danial Jumagaliyev (Chrome Lab's Song Maker)
  • Sound Effects - Danial Jumagaliyev (sfxr)
